subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Unless otherwise specified, masonry bed and perpend joints must have a nominal thickness of 10 mm.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Raked joints are not to be used in saline environments or areas subject to heavy industrial airborne pollution.

subclause.title: SubClause
